attributes.action: revoke the license to sell electricity and gas currently belonging to NPower.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to revoke the license to sell electricity and gas currently held by NPower, based on their long track record of appalling customer service, failure to inform customers of price changes, the bullying tactics employed by their salesmen, their labyrinthine complaints process and their eagerness to resort to debt collection proceedings while stretching out legitimate customer complaints over periods of many months or years.

A cursory Google search of 'npower complaints' will provide ample evidence that this company is scamming the British public and is clearly not fit to provide energy to paying customers.
